og.Description: During what is the most politically charged election in recent memory, the Society for Human Resource Management's (SHRM's) 2016 Law and Legislative conference kicked off today in Washington, D.C. The conference features political heavy hitters such as former U.S. Attorney General, Eric Holder, and popular historian and author, Doris Kerns Goodwin.
og.Title: SHRM law and legislative conference kicks off in D.C.

article_metadata.description: Latest HR News - Human resources News on Political Activity
